WorkFeedbackQuestion.name: WorkFeedbackQuestion
WorkFeedbackQuestion.description: Represents a free-form text type or multiple choice question within a set of questions.

Choices.description: New-line separated list of valid choices for multiple choice questions. Maximum length is 1000 characters.

Detail.description: Detailed instructions on how to answer the question.

IsConfidentialAnswer.description: Answers to questions marked confidential will not be shared with the subject of the review. This field applies only to performance summaries.

IsOptional.description: If this option is selected, the question is optional and isn’t required to be answered. This field applies only to performance summaries.

Name.description: A short description of the question, which can be used as a header for reports and Calibration.

Number.description: The order of the question that is displayed within the question set, such as question number three in a question set that has five questions.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the WorkFeedbackQuestion.

QuestionSetId.description: The question set this question is a part of.

Text.description: The body of the question. Max length is 16384 characters.

Type.description: Allows for either a free-form text answer or a multiple choice question defined by new-line separate choices in the ‘Choices’ field. Valid picklist values are: MultipleChoice FreeText Rating
